entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:39 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 08:39 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
